stormtracks TestingÂ¶

stormtracks tests go in the tests/ directory and subdirectories. Individual bug tests should be named e.g. bugs/test_bug_22.py where the issue in question is Issue 22 in the github issue tracker. All tests should be run before each new release. Additionally, style checking is done using the pep8 style checker, with a modified maximum line length of 100 characters.

Tests must be run from the tests/ directory due to the way that the current stormtracks module is loaded (by using sys.path.insert(0, '../..'))

Run functional tests with:

nosetests functional

PEP8 tests with:

nosetests pep8

or just bugs:

nosetests bugs

or all tests (warning, this may take a while because of interactive tests, which will show matplotlib displays):

nosetests
